text: Marika Nicolette Green (born 21 June 1943) is a Swedish-French actress. She is known for her role as Bee in Emmanuelle (1974). She played the lead female role in Robert Bresson's Pickpocket at the age of 16. She is the aunt of actress Eva Green.Walter Green, incidentally, played Jacques, the man rejected by Marie in Bresson's Au hasard Balthazar -http://www.mastersofcinema.org/bresson/TheNews.html#2005-10-29 Green married Austrian cinematographer Christian Berger. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Marika Green
